### part 3: private contract deployment

# 1. compose the transaction
curl --data '{"method":"parity_composeTransaction","params":[{"from":"0x08bcf855503571c673c28fdb31add07c433b005e", "data":""}],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545

# 3. encrypt the deployment transaction
curl --data '{"method":"private_composeDeploymentTransaction","params":["latest", "", ["0x3f4ef948fd7307e82b67bb438ad9e14e6aea7c4d"], "0x0"],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545
